trans-unit.source: The NetMsmqSecurityElement class encapsulates the MSMQ security features available when using the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
Objects of this type are created by creating an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding> binding.
You can then use this object to reference all of the various security settings related to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding> binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetMsmqSecurityElement"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq> instance encapsulates the SOAP message security settings.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
This property determines the type of security used by the associated `NetMsmqBinding`.
The following list describes the acceptable values: - `None` - No security will be used.
- `Both` - Both message-based security and transport security will be used.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement"></xref> element that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
This property enables access to Msmq Transport security settings.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
